Translations.Text: My ne poslaly pered tym, yak vy krim lyudey komu my nadykhnuly. Poprositʹ tsi khto znayte svyate pysannya, yakshcho vy ne znayete
My yakshcho yim z dokazamy ta svyatymy pysannyam. Ta my poslaly vnyz do vas tse povidomlennya, shchob proholosyty dlya vse lyudey shcho posylayetʹsya vnyz yim, mozhlyvo vony viddzerkalyatʹ
tsey khto zamyslyly z·hubni skhemy harantiya shcho BOH ne vyklykaye zemlyu do nykh kovtka, abo shcho retribution ne prybuv yim koly vony naymenshi ochikuyutʹ tse
Tse mozhe vrazyty yikh v toy chas, yak vony splyatʹ; vony mozhutʹ nikoly ne vtikty
Abo tse mozhe vrazyty yikh v toy chas, yak vony strashno ochikuyutʹ tse. Vash Lord Compassionate, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
vony ne pobachyly vsi rechi utvoreni BOHOM? Yikhni tini otochuyutʹ yikh pravo ta vlivo, u zahalʹnomu podanni do BOHA, ta okhoche
Do BOHA prostrates vse u nebi ta vse na zemli - kozhnyy vytvir - ta tak roblyatʹ anhely; bez naymenshoyi zukhvalosti
Vony povaha yikhniy Lord, vysoko nad nymy, ta vony roblyatʹ shcho vony nakazuyutʹsya shchob zrobyty
BOH proholosyv: "Ne obozhnyuyte dvokh bohiv; ye tilʹky odyn boh. Vy budete povaha Meni yedyna
Yomu nalezhytʹ vse u nebi ta zemli ta tomu, relihiya povynna buty prysvyachena absolyutno yomu yedynyy. Chy ne mohly b vy obozhnyuvaty za vynyatkom BOHA
Budʹ-yaki blahoslovlyayuchi vy polyublyayete z BOHA. Dosi, koly zavhodno vy zaznayete budʹ-yakoho neshchastya vy nehayno skarzhytesʹ yomu
Dosi, yak tilʹky Vin relieves vash affliction, deyakyy z vy perekhodyte do idola obozhnyuyete
